name: Weevil Warrior
description:
WEEVIL WARRIOR

is a fast-paced Game Boy platformer, made in ZGB! Can you escape the grain silo and avoid the weevils?

The game was developed in 24 hours for the UNL Cornhacks 2022 hackathon.

You can play the game in browser on this page, or download the rom and play it on an emulator or flash cart!

Controls:

Run Left: Left Arrow / A
Run Right: Right Arrow / D
Jump:  Z / Alt / J

Feel free to check out the source code on the Github page!
